mapper.select: select id, lecturer_user_no, total_income, history_money, enable_balances, freeze_balances, bank_card_no, bank_name, bank_branch_name, bank_user_name, bank_id_card_no, sort, sign, status_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified from education_user.lecturer_ext where lecturer_user_no = #{id}

select id, lecturer_user_no, total_income, history_money, enable_balances, freeze_balances, bank_card_no, bank_name, bank_branch_name, bank_user_name, bank_id_card_no, sort, sign, status_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified from education_user.lecturer_ext limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into education_user.lecturer_ext(lecturer_user_no, total_income, history_money, enable_balances, freeze_balances, bank_card_no, bank_name, bank_branch_name, bank_user_name, bank_id_card_no, sort, sign, status_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{lecturerUserNo}, #{totalIncome}, #{historyMoney}, #{enableBalances}, #{freezeBalances}, #{bankCardNo}, #{bankName}, #{bankBranchName}, #{bankUserName}, #{bankIdCardNo}, #{sort}, #{sign}, #{statusId}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.update:
update education_user.lecturer_ext
lecturer_user_no = #{lecturerUserNo},
total_income = #{totalIncome},
history_money = #{historyMoney},
enable_balances = #{enableBalances},
freeze_balances = #{freezeBalances},
bank_card_no = #{bankCardNo},
bank_name = #{bankName},
bank_branch_name = #{bankBranchName},
bank_user_name = #{bankUserName},
bank_id_card_no = #{bankIdCardNo},
sort = #{sort},
sign = #{sign},
status_id = #{statusId},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
where id = #{id}
